Past members

T.O.P

G-Dragon

Introduction

GD & TOP was a South Korean hip-hop/pop duo formed by G-Dragon and T.O.P, the rappers of the K-pop boy band BIGBANG in 2010. Their debut album, also titled “GD & TOP” (2010), achieved commercial success and became one of the best-selling albums of the year in South Korea. The album featured hit tracks such as “High High,” “Oh Yeah,” and “Knock Out,” all of which charted in the top five on the Gaon Digital Chart.

After a five-year hiatus, they made a comeback with the single “Zutter,” which reached number two on the Gaon Digital Chart. Unfortunately, they presumably disbanded on May 29, 2023, following T.O.P’s confirmation of his departure from BIGBANG.
